trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud hopes that you are ready to rejoin the main host.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Alliance recruit.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_SEQ_02<tab>Speak with M'naago.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_SEQ_03<tab>Follow M'naago to Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Alliance recruit.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Alliance recruit.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_TODO_02<tab>Speak with M'naago.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_TODO_03<tab>Follow M'naago to Ala Ghiri.

TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_MNAAGO_000_001<tab>Because I've got other skills! Need I remind you I'm one of the finest hunters this tribe has ever seen? And speak for yourself! I don't remember you being a master culinarian!
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>...How long has it been since we saw Father? Maybe Alphinaud and I ought to visit Sharlayan.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_LYSE_000_010<tab>So if your mother's food is so good, why are you such a terrible cook? Honestly, you've got to get her to teach you the basics while we're here.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>I trust you are well rested and refreshed, yes? Then let us return to the front.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>The greater part of the Alliance forces should have advanced into the Peaks by now, but I expect we will pass many of our comrades on the road east.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>There is a checkpoint along the way, as I recall, but we will need only to identify ourselves to the soldiers in order to pass.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALLIEDRECRUIT_000_030<tab>Scions! A pleasure to have you with us again.

TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALLIEDRECRUIT_000_031<tab>You'll be happy to hear we've taken Ala Ghiri, and have already begun fortifying it as our new base of operations in the Peaks. Give a shout to the lads as you pass, eh?
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>The imperials sure do like their towers, don't they?
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_LYSE_000_045<tab>My village─the one we visited with Meffrid─is far to the north. There's no easy way to get to it from here, though...
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Through the pass and onward to the southeast, was it?
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_RAUBAHN_000_055<tab>Well met, Sci─ Wait, where are the rest of you?
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_PIPIN_000_060<tab>Everything appears to be in order. Very good, very good...
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_CONRAD_000_065<tab>Enjoy your time with M'naago and her kin? Aye, that's what I want to hear. Too many soldiers forget the importance of time away from all this.

TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_SERPENTOFFICER_000_070<tab>On behalf of the Elder Seedseer, I thank you for your swift and decisive action against the primal menace. We are not unaware of the danger it posed to our fair nation.

TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_STORMOFFICER_000_075<tab>The imperials underestimated us once, and they paid dearly for it. They may not be so easily deceived next time─but if we cannot fool them, we will simply have to break them!
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_MNAAGO_000_080<tab>As you can see, this part of the Peaks is much higher than the northern reaches, hence why the imperials built Specula Imperatoris where they did.

TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_MNAAGO_000_081<tab>See those three towers to the east? That's her. Sits right on the edge of a cliff, so attacking from the north is a fool's errand. From the south, on the other hand, she's no different from any other imperial installation.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_MNAAGO_000_082<tab>You see now why Velodyna was so important, eh? Right, then. Come along─they're waiting for us in Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALISAIE_000_090<tab>The settlement is remarkably intact. I see little evidence of fighting...
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_LYSE_000_095<tab>Ala Ghiri's famous for that giant crystal. Some say Rhalgr Himself put it there.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_100<tab>Ala Ghiri was once a hub of trade and commerce, as I recall, hence the need for a large central square.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_MNAAGO_000_110<tab>Here we are. The new base of operations for the Alliance and the Resistance!
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_RAUBAHN_000_111<tab>Ah, there you are!
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_112<tab>Greetings, General. I see you have been quite busy in our absence.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_RAUBAHN_000_113<tab>Less than you may imagine. The imperials fled at our coming, and we took the village without a fight.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_RAUBAHN_000_114<tab>Your timing is impeccable. We were about to discuss our strategy to seize Specula Imperatoris.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_ALPHINAUD_000_115<tab>Though we are fresh from the road, we should be glad to attend.
TEXT_STMBDA608_02534_RAUBAHN_000_116<tab>Good. Take a moment to gather yourselves, and join us when you are ready.
